---
title: "Get Block Information"
---

Fetch general information about an Ethereum transaction.
## Example Request

```javascript
curl -X GET \
    -H 'Content-Type: application/json' \
    https://api.cinder.cloud/api/ethereum/block/0x330cb5995b5517169249e56f8744d895af547884fdbd0f6f75df6acacc599704
```

## Example Response Observable

```json
{
    "number": 7912624,
    "hash": "0x330cb5995b5517169249e56f8744d895af547884fdbd0f6f75df6acacc599704",
    "parentHash": "0x43cab41d08a3a98fc4511f9bca20bfaeddb23566a34651990863c9f4cc155092",
    "nonce": 6028356431347189122,
    "sha3Uncles": "0x1dcc4de8dec75d7aab85b567b6ccd41ad312451b948a7413f0a142fd40d49347",
    "logsBloom": "",
    "transactionsRoot": "0x1e7d7f7072a1eab233d3e0c7f0b73fbd66921521012a70d5728ab4cbe6736469",
    "stateroot": "0x94cd234b6748a4af18b45cd961015e4b6f459804ea12cc6dda32e71f6d308b8f",
    "receiptsRoot": "0x061226f54e3e974cff662f3daa6d9863afc4c6b86f9756729fdddca447f372ae",
    "author": "0x52bc44d5378309ee2abf1539bf71de1b7d7be3b5",
    "miner": "0x52bc44d5378309ee2abf1539bf71de1b7d7be3b5",
    "mixhash": "0x55497072d0aaf415e8cb0d412f7902db711a7c65abbf8fadb6a459893dbe7e1f",
    "difficulty": 2138285043804247,
    "totalDifficulty": 1.0513509616788520378231e+22,
    "extraData": "0x50505945206e616e6f706f6f6c2e6f7267",
    "size": 19761,
    "gasLimit": 8000029,
    "gasused": 7980432,
    "timestamp": 1559918540,
    "uncles": [],
    "sealFields": [
        "0xa055497072d0aaf415e8cb0d412f7902db711a7c65abbf8fadb6a459893dbe7e1f",
        "0x8853a9063c15e40582"
    ]
}
```
